messages.message: Hi Anil, need to access one app on aihub prod, can you make me admin for a while or help debug on call?

```2024-10-30 12:31:45.289	2024-10-30T19:31:44.360442185Z stdout F [2024-10-30 19:31:44,360] [ForkPoolWorker-265/ThreadPoolExecutor-10_0] {/instabase/workers/celery-app-tasks/py/instabase/data_api_utils/_sheet/confidence_fns.py:1299} ERROR - [trace_id=947bedb7c5193935] - job-id=4e518ca2-71a1-4911-bd31-e7d81a933165 task-id=4e518ca2-71a1-4911-bd31-e7d81a933165-Stage1 username=support-testing.aihubib_instabase.com (http://support-testing.aihubib_instabase.com) stage-id=Stage1 step=s5 get_extracted_unsure_list error: Misalignment between record text and record OCR information: Mismatch: 1 lines in `text` vs 183 in `lines````

Found the issue — APIs from `v2/jobs` were recently moved to `v2/apps/runs` in 24.42, but we didn’t realize that `v2/jobs` was still being used in this feature. In AIHub, SDK and Postman and docs were all developed and mention only `v2/apps/runs`. Few action items:

- Update the path for the re-extraction use case to use `v2/apps/runs` instead of `v2/jobs`
- Check for any other occurrences of `v2/jobs` in the UI and modify them as needed
- Add a UAT/system test for the re-extraction feature

Found the issue — The app run APIs were present it both `v2/jobs`  and `v2/apps/runs` . As a result v2/apps/runs/status /v2/jobs/status referred to the same code. Only v2/apps/runs  is exposed as an API and SDK.

In 24.42, removed the v2/jobs duplicated endpoints as I wanted to use it for run deletion related deletion job status. v2/jobs/status now is used to query FS deletion job status. This removed X endpoint used by re-extraction.

Few action items:
- Update the path in frontend for re-extraction  to use `v2/apps/runs` instead of `v2/jobs`
- Check for any other occurrences of `v2/jobs` in the UI and modify them as needed. I had checked earlier for ‘v2/jobs’ but string search returned empty.
- Add a UAT/system test for the re-extraction feature
